description: React functional component for an authentication page using Supabase for login and signup functionalities, with UI for email/password authentication and navigation upon success.

methods.name: AuthPage()
methods.description: React component handling login and signup via Supabase with UI elements.

methods.name: doAuth
methods.description: Handles the form submission for login or signup, interacts with Supabase auth API, manages navigation and error handling.
